casebody.data:
FIDUCIAL, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, Appellant/Cross-Respondent,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION, f/k/a the Bank of New York AS TRUSTEE FOR the CERTIFICATE HOLDER OF CWALT, INC. Alternative Loan Trust 2007-J1, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2001-JI, a Delaware Corporation, Respondent/Cross-Appellant. No. 71864 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 11, 2018

AFFIRMED.
